roleset.name: to support or reinforce
roleset.note: BUTTRESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'buttress' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from buttress.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: A number of commercial grain users buttressed that opinion yesterday by [*] buying certain corn options for delivery in March , [*]indicating to analysts that the commercial companies would use the options [*-1] to hedge against expected corn sales in next year 's first quarter .
example.arg: A number of commercial grain users
by [*] buying certain corn options for delivery in March
[*] indicating to analysts that the commercial companies would use the options [*-1]to hedge against expected corn sales in next year 's first quarter
